menu_sniper_graze_damage_desc: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Snipers that hit their target deal ##$multibasic;## of the damage dealt in a ##$multibasic2;## radius around the bullet trajectory.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;For headshots, the graze skill will deal ##$multipro;## of the weapon's damage instead of ##$multipro2;##.$NL;$NL;Note: The damage will not be dealt towards civilians.
